marklogic.body: I don't know as much as most of you on this post but it sure does look like Podsednik earned a Spot on the 2012 Phillies. His bat is hot, he isn't hurting anyone defensively and he appears to be a solid player vs. Laynce Nix. I remember Nix hurting the Phils one time last year (I think it was a walk Off hit or HR) but aside from that not much. He was a quick flash in the pan. Unless the coaches & Manager saw something the rest of us did not - I also believe that Podsednik deserves a shot to go North with the team.
